name: Hey, Babel? God Wants To Talk.
name_original: Hey, Babel? God Wants To Talk.
description:
God called. He wants to talk. Build a tower to reach him. He's waiting at 50 meters.

"Hey, Babel? God Wants To Talk." is a tiny dumb game made for the Ludum Dare 49 game jam in about 6 hours.

Controls: LMB to do stuff, R to restart.
